channel.title: Host Problem
channel.description:
When i host a server ppl say its no lag. But when i play it for myself its lag galore.[br][size=1]Posted on: November 17, 2007, 09:54:45 AM[/size][hr]and is their a way to generate ip's-Ips to make a random serial number
So other hosters won't know ips?

item.title: Host Problem
item.dc:creator: @novalye Novalye
item.description:
@novalye wrote:

The reason therer is so much lag is because you have to run the server so people can play and if you are using silab’s, it takes two windows to run. The most common reason is because so many windows or your computer is just loosing memory.

Read full topic
